Professional Summary

Educator, developer, and scientist, currently working towards accessible technology education. As Head of Operations at First Draft, I combine my background in research science and education with full-stack development expertise to democratize programming knowledge. My unique trajectory—from analyzing satellite data and publishing scientific algorithms to building web applications and teaching coding to beginners—positions me perfectly for roles at the intersection of education, technology, and AI.
